_header: Pride is out and pride is in
Subjects: carols, of moral counsel; sins, deadly
_description: A song against Pride — five quatrains (aaab) and burden (bb): ‘Man be war er þu be wo /Þink on pride & let hym goo’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
Pryde is owt & pride ys yn& pride ys þe begynnyng of
                    euery syn…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…[Thoro]w his pride he lost his sight[And fell] down in to
                    endles woExplicit

BLSl2593.First Lines:
Pryde is out & pride is inne& pride is rot of euery
                    synne…
BLSl2593.Last Lines:
…Þat he foryeue þe þi pride& þi synnys
                    þat þu hast doo

BodRawPoe138.Transcription:
man be war or þou be wothynk of prydAnd lat it goffor
                    pryd ys outh & pryd
BodRawPoe138.Note: Burden only, copied on a parchment flyleaf at the end.
